name: Portafolio
body:
##  Welcome!!

Hi! my name is [C. Andres Poveda](https://www.facebook.com/andres.poveda.10420) , I'm a Software Engineer,currently designing and developing UI across their various products. I specialize in JavaScript and client side coding, but I sometimes work in and have experience on the full web stack (e.g. Node.js, Ruby on Rails, Django). I have worked in Angular.js, Backbone.js, jQuery and other Front End environments.

Specialities: 
• JavaScript - client side, server side (Node.js), and mobile
• HTML/CSS (and similar technologies such as CSS Preprocessors)
• Unix environments (e.g. Linux, Mac OS X)


I'm actively on top of the latest technologies, techniques, and applications revolving around website design and front-end development. I always look at how I can make my projects better, more attractive, and more efficient. Enjoy working with teammates as passionate about design and front-end development as I am.

**## Specialties**

 HTML5,  CSS3, JavaScript, AngularJS, jQuery, NodeJS, responsive layouts, front-end design, UI/UX, front-end development, rapid prototyping, freelance, consulting, full site build-out


I have experience with several products in the Microsoft development stack including building mobile and web applications with Visual Studio, C#, and .NET. I also have experience building and maintaining applications with  MongoDB, MySQL,Apache, WordPress, PHP, Javascript, and Ruby on Rails.


I find creative solutions that fit the unique identities, marketing goals and user needs of my clients. I'm passionate about my work and I strive to include the latest open source & web-based technologies in my projects.

 My [Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/notifications)!

***

***
